intro: Jussiaea elegans, commonly known as the elegant jussiaea, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Onagraceae. It is native to South America, particularly found in regions of Brazil, Peru, and Colombia. The plant is characterized by its slender, erect stems and small, white to pinkish flowers that bloom in clusters. Its leaves are alternate, ovate, and often covered with fine hairs. Jussiaea elegans is typically found in moist, shaded environments such as stream banks and wetlands.
